SEARCH
Module brickGame
Package brickGame.Model

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
brickGame.Model.GameModel
public class GameModel extends Object
Represents the game model in this game. Manages the state of the game, including the ball, paddle, blocks, and bonuses.

  • Field Summary
